verbs.description: [V: have] [ARG1: bushels of fun] [ARGM-LOC: at lincoln county apple festival] the streets of lincolnton will be lined with over 200 vendors and exhibitors for the annual lincoln county apple festival happening saturday from 9 a m to 4 p m lincoln county apple festival lincoln county hurricane florence apple festival queen sir purr lincolnton
